about_the_game:
Across the Valley is your friendly farm simulator, developed exclusively for VR.
Lend a hand — literally — so that everything can grow and thrive.
Sow, water and harvest your own plants.
Raise adorable baby animals.
Milk the cows, shear the sheep and go on a truffle hunt with the pigs — all in fun mini- and micro-games.
The graphics in Across the Valley have a fantastic hand-drawn style. The grass here is lush and green, and the sunsets are golden. Enjoy the idyllic countryside and relax to the sounds of the atmospheric soundtrack.
On your farm, there’s something to do every day. Give your plants and animals plenty of love and care! They’ll reward you with a bountiful harvest. You can use your profits to expand your farm — your planning table will let you see it all easily.

Features:


Action Point Locomotion System:
  • No Motion Sickness! With the action point locomotion system, no artificial movement is done!
  • Each action point is designed carefully to have everything you need within the reach of your hands.
  • Like: Everything you need to shear a sheep is right at the shearing station within your hand’s reach.
  • Or: Everything you need to work on the fields is at the tool spot. All tools are in reach of your hands.
  • You can get to an action point with just a blink of an eye.

No button learning:
  • Do everything with your own hands. No extensive button learning is needed.
  • To dig up a field, take a shovel with you and grab it with two hands. Then dig the field up like you would in the real world.
  • To sow out seeds, just grab a seed bowl, grab some seeds from it and throw them on the field.


Automatic Micro Games:
  • Instead of typical minigames that interrupt the game, Across the Valley automatically starts and stops a microgame when you perform an action.
  • An example: Sowing out seeds will automatically start a “seeding” micro-game when the first seed hits the field. The better you distribute the seeds, the more plants grow. Once the seed basket is empty, the microgame finishes and your plants start growing.


Stay busy:
  • 36 tasks (quests) guide you from the basics of seeding to going on a truffle hunt with your pigs.
  • Infinite orders keep you busy, even after the main game.

Cozy mood:
  • Carefully composed art style that lets you enter a comic-style world.
  • A well balanced mix of hand-drawn 4k textures and programmed effects create the illusion of a hand-drawn VR world.
  • Relaxing, exclusive soundtrack that puts you in the right mood.
  • Upgrade your house to make it look nice and cozy.



Until now, you’ve only played farm simulators — but now you can move into your own virtual farm.

name: Across the Valley

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: VR headset required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Geforce 3070 or better
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: VR headset required

short_description: Across the Valley is your friendly VR farm where you really lend a hand. Instead of clicking around in menus, you care for the animals and plants with your own hands. Instead of looking at the farm from up above, you yourself can relax in this hand-drawn paradise.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
